thread.title: WennSoft is now KEY2ACT - company rebrand launches new solution
thread.title_full: WennSoft is now KEY2ACT - company rebrand launches new solution

author: Kimberly Kane
title: WennSoft is now KEY2ACT - company rebrand launches new solution
text:
A new name and a refined solution strategy took center stage Monday at the Synergy 2015 User Conference. KEY2ACT, formerly WennSoft, unveiled a highly asset centric solution for construction and field service operations that empowers organizations to manage the lifecycle relationships with their customers in a new way. The solution delivers well-armed mobile workers, reduced emergency service calls, and more profitable construction and service contracts. “We’re in a unique position as market leader in the delivery of solutions for construction and field services – and specifically those working with large equipment or assets. With 20 years of experience, an incredible customer base, the capital to deliver on the vision, and a disciplined approach to development – I believe our customers have an increasing strategic advantage over their competition,” states KEY2ACT CEO, John Jazwiec. “Every market, sooner or later, is impacted by disruptive innovation. For the construction and field service industry, KEY2ACT is that disrupter.”
The new corporate identity also represents core elements of the company’s transformation from WennSoft, Inc. to KEY2ACT. The name reflects an organization built on employee empowerment, concrete in focus, disciplined in delivery and disruptive in approach.
About Key2Act
KEY2ACT is the construction AND field service technology leader. KEY2ACT drives actionable delivery of differentiating innovation to its customers. We protect our customers’ investment in technology through focused solutions that create workflow efficiencies, enhance cost savings and build customer loyalty. Based in New Berlin, WI, KEY2ACT combines 20 years of experience serving customers as WennSoft with visionary new leadership committed to driving innovation focused on specialty trades, facilities maintenance, and other large asset- or equipment-centric industries. For more information on KEY2ACT, please see http://www.key2act.com , or call 1-866-Key2Act (1-866-539-2288).
For more information or to schedule an interview, contact Kimberly Kane at 414.202.5762.
